page.title: 15SOUTH MOOR LIBRARY
page.content: South Moor library is run by 2 lady librarians.It contains about 45000 books and over 7000 people a week use it.The following information is available to the general public at the library: Telephone Directories are kept covering the whole country.Tiimetables for buses,railways,airways and sea ferries are kept for 6 months at a time then updated.An address book is kept showing all local clubs,societies and organizations.Posters are displayed showing all local events, concerts,fairs and fun runs.Timetables for cinemas,theatres,operas,swimming baths and sports centres are kept.Maps and local history books are also available.All these services make the library a valuable centre of information and communication for the public of South Moor.
